events: Hadewigis was born in Doelen in 1374.
Hadewigis moved to Corte gracht.A.5 after marriage.
Lost sibling Euffemia when Euffemia was 10 in 1382.
Lost sibling Ghoudekinen when Ghoudekinen was 0 in 1389.
Lost father at the age of 16.
Lost sibling Oderada when Oderada was 13 in 1390.
Lost sibling Liudburgis when Liudburgis was 10 in 1393.
Lost sibling Ysewin when Ysewin was 19 in 1395.
Lost sibling Diewiven when Diewiven was 16 in 1396.
Became caretaker of Ase, Eghenonis, Froumoldus at age 23.
Moved in with husband Ase's family after marriage.
Got married with Ase at age 23 in 1396.
